name: Mutant Mashup
description:
This game was made for Discord Jam 5 (2021) where we had to make a game in 48 hours and the theme was MUTATION.

CONTROLS AND INFO

In this game, the ball is an experiment which has different DNA structures which give it different powers (which are both positive and negative in effect), only for a set amount of time.
These changes in powers is denoted by the change in color of the ball.  

Press A and D to move
Press SPACE to jump (and double jump)
Click to teleport (possible only once every effect)
Use the mouse to look around using X Ray Vision

Purple  - Teleport 
Green - Double Jump
Red - No Jump
Black - Inverted Controls
White - Hidden Vision / X-Ray Mode
Yellow - Blindness / Limited Visibility

You do not need to remember the color or the mutations, the game shows the current mutation and the amount of time left for it to end.

Level resets once all the abilities for that level are cycled through, but if the player reaches the end point for a level, then the next stage starts
